body: Commonly known as a whip sword, this deadly weapon is fashioned from one to four 5-foot-long, razor-sharp blades of flexible steel. The weapon is wielded by whipping the blades at one's opponent. The coiled blade is fine and flexible enough to be worn as a belt.
name: Urumi
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Mastering Combat/Eastern Armor and Weapons/Eastern Weapons/Weapon Descriptions/Urumi
